price: (122) Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him].
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
